Title: Approval of appeal court in Ogun will boost justice delivery – Abiodun
Summary: Approval of appeal court in Ogun will boost justice delivery – Governor . Prince Dapo Abiodun commended the President of the Court of Appeal, Hon. Justice Monica Bolna’an Dongban-Mensem, for approving the establishment of the Abeokuta Division .

Title: World Bank criticises Nigeria’s social protection system, says only 44% of benefits reach poor
Summary: The World Bank has raised serious concerns over the effectiveness of Nigeria's social safety-net framework . Less than half of the total benefits from government-run programmes actually reach poor households . According to the Bank’s new report, titled ‘The State’

Title: Gov Otu makes fresh appointment
Summary: Cross River State Governor, Senator Bassey Otu, has approved the appointment of Barr Nsa Ekpo as the chairman of Cross River Social Investment Programme (SIP) and Dr Calistus Ekpo . The appointment was made in a bid to strengthen his administration and foster effective service delivery .

Title: Remi Tinubu distributes menstrual hygiene packs to schoolgirls in Zamfara
Summary: Oluremi Tinubu has distributed 10,000 packs of menstrual hygiene products to schoolchildren across Zamfara State . The First Lady said the Renewed Hope is the Renewing Hope of Nigeria's President .

Title: Lagos LG boss urges youth delegates to be worthy ambassadors at AU summit
Summary: Apapa Local Government Executive Chairman, Hon Idowu Adejumoke Senbanjo, urges youth delegates to be worthy ambassadors at AU summit in Ethiopia . The summit, themed “Building a United States,” is the African Union Leadership Youth Summit .

Title: No basis to sanction naval officer in Wike clash – Matawalle
Summary: The clash occurred over a disputed parcel of land in Abuja’s Gaduwa District . Wike confronted Yerima and his team of armed naval personnel guarding the property . The property reportedly linked to a former Chief of Naval Staff, Vice Admiral Zubairu Gambo (retd.)

Title: Pakistan grants lifetime immunity to president, current army chief
Summary: Pakistan grants lifetime immunity to president, current army chief Asim Munir . Munir was promoted to field marshal after Pakistan's clash with India in May .

Title: 2026 WCQ Playoffs: Nigeria vs Gabon – time and where to watch
Summary: Nigeria face Gabon in a decisive playoff clash . The Super Eagles of Nigeria continue their push for a place at the 2026 FIFA World Cup .

Title: “I’m Available”, Johnny Drille’s New Single Becomes an Anthem of Assurance
Summary: Mavin's musical maestro Johnny Drille dropped a track that speaks directly to the heart . His new single, "I'm Available," released on November 7, 2025, is already making waves .

Title: NSCDC arrests 20 suspects for alleged threat to national security
Summary: The Nigeria Security and Civil Defence Corps (NSCDC) has arrested 20 persons for various offences that are threats to Nigeria’s national security .
